title: Life Support System
description: A group of devices that allow a being to survive in space

title: Attitude Control System
description: Sensors and actuators that allow the orientation and movement in space

title: Command and data handling
description: Systems to perform validation, decoding and broadcasting of commands to the other systems

title: External Commuincation
description: Commuincatin systems needed to contact external stations and agents

title: Guidance, Navigation and Control
description: Systems needed to calculate, navigate and steer the path
